page.title: 13Sport in the Area
page.content: Wimbledon Stadium,at Plough Lane,is famous for greyhound racing,stock car racing and speedway(motor bikes). Wimbledon also has a famous football team which has recently beaten Halifax. In between a pub and the football ground is a small roadway,blocked off by a gate.Behind the gate is the back of the changing rooms.There is a big car park reserved for the manager,coach and directors of the football club.2 small iron gates let in the 100's of fans.An alleyway leads to a small hot- dog stand.Stone seats are placed next to the bright blue family box and next to the manager's seat.There is a small tunnel under the family steats leading to the players' changing rooms.Above the tunnel is the team's badge.
